metadata.name: Malicious Base64 Encoded PowerShell Keywords in Command Lines
metadata.comment: Detects base64 encoded strings used in hidden malicious PowerShell command lines

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\powershell.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\pwsh.exe'))) AND (lower(LOWER(process.file.name)) in ('powershell\.exe', 'pwsh\.dll')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' hidden ')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('agkadabzageazabtagkabgagac8adabyageabgbzagyazqbya')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('axrzywrtaw4gl3ryyw5zzmvy')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('iaaqb0ahmayqbkag0aaqbuacaalwb0ahiayqbuahmazgblahia')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('jpdhnhzg1pbiavdhjhbnnmzx')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('ygbpahqacwbhagqabqbpag4aiaavahqacgbhag4acwbmaguacg')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('yml0c2fkbwluic90cmfuc2zlc')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('agmaaab1ag4aawbfahmaaqb6agua')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('jabjaggadqbuagsaxwbzagkaegbla')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('jgnodw5rx3npem')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('qaywboahuabgbraf8acwbpahoazq')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('rjahvua19zaxpl')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('y2h1bmtfc2l6z')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('ae8algbdag8abqbwahiazqbzahmaaqbvag4a')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('katwauaemabwbtahaacgblahmacwbpag8abg')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('lplknvbxbyzxnzaw9u')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('sqbpac4aqwbvag0acabyaguacwbzagkabwbua')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('su8uq29tchjlc3npb2')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('ty5db21wcmvzc2lvb')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('ae8algbnaguabqbvahiaeqbtahqacgblageabq')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('katwauae0azqbtag8acgb5afmadabyaguayqbta')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('lplk1lbw9yevn0cmvhb')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('sqbpac4atqblag0abwbyahkauwb0ahiazqbhag0a')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('su8utwvtb3j5u3ryzwft')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('ty5nzw1vcnltdhjlyw')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('aegaugbfaeearabfaekatgbgae8anga0a')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('qasabsaeuaqqbeaf8asqboaeyatwa2adqa')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('riukvbrf9jtkzpnj')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('sfjfqurfsu5gtzy0')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('vabiafiarqbbaeqaxwbjae4argbpadyana')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('0azqbtag0abwb2agua')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('1lbw1vdm')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('aguabqbtag8adgbla')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('bqblag0abqbvahyazq')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('bwvtbw92z')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('zw1tb3zl'))))
